infos.value: Phew... Glad we got out of there.
There was nothing for us but to get the hell out of there!
If we had stayed, we all would have been killed, aye?
But some of those monks may have survived... Got a plan for that?
You didn't stop to think that they might tell Sadali we fled like rats from a flood?
If someone tells Lord Sadali, then our dream of being His Holiness's royal guardâ€”
So now what? Gonna go see if any of those monks are still breathing?
Though I'm not really feeling it, aye.
If you're going killing, I'm going too.
Looks like you're in high spirits.
